title: How to Survive
notes: Initial UI and intro are fine. Seems to get stuck loading the story mode. A black screen is presented after character selection and never goes away

title: How to Survive
notes: Blackscreen after loading storymode or challengemode as described by earlier comment exists, but can be easily overcome by pressing escape once, therefore still completely stable.
press enter on the black screen.
title: How to Survive

notes: press Enter on any blackscreen -> profit
title: How to Survive

notes: When you encounter a black screen simply press enter or esc to bypass it. Also it appears to have issues playing videos but I haven't noticed any reason you would have to watch them for a full game experience.  Sometimes you have to force quit the game when you exit the game as it gets hung.
